title: Baseball Almanac
description: Baseball Almanac is an interactive baseball encyclopedia with 540,000+ pages of in-depth baseball facts, original baseball research, and baseball statistics not found anywhere else. Organized by categories such as all-star games, awards, fabulous feats, famous firsts, hall of fame, player stats, record book, and year in review, the site also features current baseball news and 'Today in Baseball History' notes. All of the information on the Baseball Almanac site itself is free.
